name: setclickonceversion
description: Update a project file's (.csproj or .vbproj file) ClickOnce version, and optionally set the Minimum Required Version to the lastest version.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Version to update the ClickOnce version number to. This version must be of the format Major.Minor.Build or Major.Minor.Build.Revision

inputs.name: minimum
inputs.label: Update Minimum Required Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: MinimumRequiredVersion will be updated to match the new Version. Setting the MinimumRequiredVersion property forces the ClickOnce application to update automatically without prompting the user.

inputs.name: minimumversion
inputs.label: Minimum Required Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Minimum Required Version to update the ClickOnce version number to. If blank, this will be the same as the Version numberThis version must be of the format Major.Minor.Build or Major.Minor.Build.Revision
